name: Christmas Stack Of Soap - Gingerbread, Sleigh Ride, and Cranberry Spice - Cold Process Soaps - Inclu
description:
I just love the scents of Christmas, don't you? The scent of a fresh cut tree laden with new snow, Gingerbread cookies in the oven, and Juicy Cranberries on the Holiday table....ah.....I love the scents of the holiday!

My Christmas Stack of Soaps contain:

* Sleigh Ride - A wonderful scent of fresh cut trees and new snow!
* Gingerbread - A sweet scent loved by all!
* Cranberry Spice - A fresh, juicy, spicy scent!

My soaps are made using the Cold Process method. They are handmade and hand cut. I only use the freshest ingredients, which include:

Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Canola Oil
Shea Butter
Palm Oil
Coconut Oil
Castor Oil
Sodium Hydroxide
Distilled Water
Fragrance Oil

This listing is for three bars of soap. The soaps are wrapped and come with a wooden soap dish...makes a perfect gift!

Handmade soap needs to be kept away from standing water. Please use the well draining soap dish so you can enjoy many, many wonderful baths/showers with my soap!

name: Black And Tan Handmade Soap - Set Of Three Bars - Great Scent For Men
description:
Men just go crazy over this scent! It's a wonderful blend of apples, cinnamon, cloves, and a hint of citrus. Oh, and it's not just for men....I love it too!

My handmade soap is made using the cold process method. My soaps contain the finest ingredients:

Extra Virgin Olive Oil
Canola Oil
Shea Butter
Palm Oil
Coconut Oil
Castor Oil
Sodium Hydroxide
Distilled Water
Fragrance Oil

This listing is for three bars of soap, weighing approx 12 ounces total.

Handmade soap needs to be kept away from standing water. Please use a well draining soap dish so you can enjoy many, many wonderful baths/showers with my soap!

I can fit 5 to 6 bars of soap in a flat rate envelope. Shipping is only $4.75! If you would like to grab more bars, go ahead and I can either make a custom listing for you, or refund your extra shipping charges. Time to stock up!

name: Custom Design Your Own Super Moisturizing Body Butter with Shea Butter - Super Moisturizing - 8 Full
description:
Do you love a certain scent but can't find it anywhere? I am offering you your OWN custom Body Butter. Custom pick your scent...mix and match so you get exactly what you want! This body butter is excellent for dry skin, and is great to use all year round.

An intense natural treatment for very dry skin. Nourishing shea butter & cocoa butter, infused with Essential Oils, to soften & protect your skin. Enriched with Vitamin E, Body Butter is a luxurious, sensual moisturizer and a favorite for softening, healing and protecting dry skin - feet, knees, elbows, hands or anywhere that needs extra moisturizing!
My Body Butter contains Sunflower Seed Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, and natural Beeswax,Soya Bean Oil. This could be the single most important product that your skin needs.

This would make a great gift for someone special!

I am selling my Body Butter in a non shattering 8 ounce jar. Your Body Butter will come in a gift box...all ready for gift giving for someone special, or to pamper yourself!

Pick from the following scents. Mix and match, or just pick one!

* Lavender - A Classic floral scent - Essential Oil
* Peppermint - A refreshing, minty scent - Essential Oil
* Pomegranate - A wonderful, sweet, juicy scent - Fragrance Oil
* Mandarin Tiki - Fruity, citrus scent - Fragrance Oil
* Green Tea - Light and refreshing - Fragrance Oil
* Cucumber - Fresh with a subtle hint of cucumber - Fragrance Oil
* Honey Oatmeal - Smells just like Burt's Bees - Fragrance Oil
* Fresh Rain - Clean, clear, crisp - Fragrance Oil
* Citrus Teakwood - A great unisex scent with a slight citrus and woodsy scent - Fragrance Oil
* Raspberry - If you love raspberry, this is for you - Fragrance Oil
* Chocolate - Who doesn't love chocolate - Fragrance Oil
* Bergamot - Floral and fruity with a spicy note

Please note your choice of scents in your notes to seller.

**Stock up and save this holiday! I can fit many more body butters, along with other products in my shop, for a flat rate shipping of $9.95!

name: I Scream, You Scream For Ice Cream Bar Soap - You Pick The Scent
description:
scream, you scream, we all scream for Ice Cream!! My adorable Ice Cream Bar Soap makes a wonderful gift for kids of all ages! Made with Goat's Milk, my Ice Cream Bar Soap is not only fun, but it's moisturizing for young skin too!

Goats milk has wonderful restorative and moisturizing properties for your skin as well as being mild enough for sensitive skin and gentle enough for a baby. Whether your skin is oily or dry the goats milk can help to bring your skin to a healthy balance.

You will receive one Ice Cream Bar Soap, which is approx 3 ounces. Pick from the following scents and colors:

Pink - Peppermint Kiss
Yellow - Lemon Lemonade
Purple - Berry Love
Orange - Juicy Orange
Green - Cool Cucumber

Available, but not shown:
Orange - Tangerine
Green - Chocolate Mint
Green/Blue - Sweet Vanilla Sugar
Pink - Pink Grapefruit
Pink - Peppermint Vanilla
Green - Sweet Lime

name: You Pick The Scent - Handmade Solid Push Up Lotion Bar With Shea Butter - Convenient Travel Size
description:
Solid, portable convenient - Lotion in a Stick! An instant moisturizer with no mess! Packaged in a push-up container that won't spill in your purse or melt in your car! Just rub into your skin for instant relief of dry skin! Great for elbows, heels, and just about anywhere!

My Solid Push Up Lotion Bar is made using the freshest ingredients. It is made with Grape Seed Oil, Shea Butter, Beeswax, and fragrance oils.

Lotion in a stick...what could be easier! These make great stocking stuffers too.

Each Solid Push Up Lotion Bar weighs 1 ounce and lasts twice as much as liquid lotion. Pick up one as a gift and one for yourself!

This listing is for one lotion bar.

Choose from the following scents:
Sweet Lavender
Apple Jack
Rain
